Class WebdecsFlatContent

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentHandler, FlatContent
public class WebdecsFlatContent
extends Object
implements FlatContent

FlatContent implementation based on the Databene Webdecs library.

Author:
Volker Bergmann
